short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple, elegant Chrome extension for planning events.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing our simple and elegant Chrome extension for event planning - a must-have tool for anyone looking to streamline their event planning process. With its intuitive user interface and powerful features, our extension offers a wide range of benefits for both professional event planners and casual users alike.
